title: Wedding & Event Planner in Sicily | Olga Fedele – Ameline Events
tagline: "Creating events that speak to your soul."
about: As a wedding and event planner based in Sicily, I help international couples and brands create unforgettable experiences—from destination weddings and vow renewals to corporate events, charity galas and bespoke celebrations. I coordinate vendors, manage timelines, support multilingual guests and bring every detail together with elegance and intention.

services.wedding.desc: Timeless celebrations, intimately designed to honour your story — from destination vows to elegant local gatherings.
services.symbolic.desc: Moments rooted in meaning — whether spiritual, cultural, or uniquely yours — designed to speak to the soul and linger in memory.
services.corporate.desc: Professional yet heartfelt — curated gatherings that reflect your brand while engaging with elegance and impact.
services.charity.desc: Purpose-driven events that inspire, including fundraisers for children and causes that matter — all delivered with grace and intent.
services.themed.desc: From bespoke beachside soirées to opulent, story-driven experiences, we design atmospheres that captivate — where every detail is curated, and every moment feels indulgently yours.
